arts.ttl: Ten-man Augsburg clinch 2-1 win with late goal against Bochum
arts.sum: FC Augsburg secured a dramatic 2-1 victory against VfL Bochum with a 90th-minute winner from Mert Kömür, despite playing with ten men. Finn Dahmen's heroics in goal proved crucial in Augsburg's resilient performance.

arts.ttl: Late winner sees 10-man Augsburg beat Bochum
arts.sum: Despite being reduced to 10 men, Augsburg managed to beat Bochum 2-1 away from home.

arts.ttl: Augsburg defender wins Rookie of the Month
arts.sum: Chrislain Matsima beat Michael Olise to win “Rookie of the Month” award for March.

arts.ttl: VfL Bochum v FC Augsburg preview: Rock solid FCA travel to relegation-threatened Blues
arts.sum: Dieter Hecking’s Bochum face a tricky test in their bid to avoid the drop.

arts.ttl: Augsburg head coach Jess Thorup wary of more officiating miscues entering the weekend
arts.sum: FC Augsburg trainer Jess Thorup took a swipe at Bundesliga referees during his Thursday press conference.

arts.ttl: Preview: VfL Bochum vs. Augsburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between VfL Bochum and Augsburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
